Tataru Zu Hestui:
Ticar Of Orok! I am glad to welcome you, young traveller. I Tataru from the tribe of Hestui! I'm one of the Shamans, keepers of the teachings of the God of Fire PA'valak Agrio!
Orc Mages control the spirits with the power of fire! We are not Elves, who worship the spirits and not people who understand magic as science!
